response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. After careful consideration, I am offering this product to you for $950,000. I am confident that this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing us to reach an agreeable transaction. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
